enter_data_login: Enter the following data to access the aplication
text_recover: To recover you password enter you email
notif_code: We have sent you an email with a code to retrieve your data to the following address:
text_code: If you don't receive this email, please check your spam box
label_recover_account: Do you already have an account?

not_ssn_itin: I do not have SSN or ITIN
yes_license: Do you have a driver’s license?
text_elegibility: Improve your chances of getting more job offers by completing your employment eligibility information.
text_cert: A new type of certification has been published, if you have it, please go to register the data.
text_lab: Highlight your profile among others by adding your academic information.
required_data: All data in this section are required
valid_cuenta: To validate your account, go to your email and click on the validate button
spam: Also remember to check your SPAM tray
no_email: IF YOU DO NOT RECEIVE THE MAIL, CLICK ON THE BUTTON
no_chat: You are not in any chat room
rotate: Rotate the screen to add your digital signature
start_travel_init: You want to start the trip?
start_travel_init1: Are you sure you want to start the trip
check_adrres: Select your address from the options below or edit your address for a new check:
text_confirm_hours: Data shown is preliminary and does not constitute final data for payment calculations.
you_arrive: You arrive by your own means
you_driver: Do you want to perform the role of driver at the worksite?
not_contract: You still do not belong to a project to create chats.
accept_sections: I have read and Accept the Terms and Conditions
accep_sections_check: You must agree to terms and conditions
required_blood: You must select an option in blood type
scan_travel: Scan workers to add to the list of trip attendants.
add_vehicle: To add a vehicle click on the floating button.
process_vehicle: To continue the process, the vehicle images must be added.
vehicle_delivery: Place of Delivery of the vehicle
register_basic1: You have completed the basic profile in Emplooy.
required_lang: You must select the language and its level.
confirm_logout: Are you sure you want to log out of the app?
confirm_typedoc: Are you sure you want to continue without providing a tax document?
alert_tax: The type of documentation registered does not allow the burden of taxes.
guide_selfie: Take a selfie with your document as shown in the image below.
no_register_crew: Tap the + button in the top right to start adding workers to your Crew Sheet
mark_all: Are you sure you want to mark all notifications as read?
expired_session: Your session has expired. Please, log in again.
address_oblig: You must select one of the options and continue or you can go back and verify your address again
sign_offer: Click here to sign with your finger
sucess_address: The address provided has been successfully verified.
error_address: Theres problem with te address provided. Please continue or edit of the address you want to use.
accept_regis: You need to accept Emplooy’s usage policy and privacy policy in order to continue.
not_not: Hello! You have notifications waiting to be read
logout_: Are you trying to get out
logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
remove_project_c: Are you sure you want to remove the worker from the project?
name: Name
warnings_16: Is the admonished person going to sign the admonishment?
warnings_17: Do you want to add a witness?
warnings_18: How do you want to search for the worker?
clockin_1: To enter the workers to the day, you must start the clock-in process.
clockin_2: You have already clocked in the day, click on the following button to see the details of the process.
clockin_3: There is a clock-in process in progress, you must indicate your temperature to be able to enter the day or go to the process.
clockin_4: Before starting the clock in process, you must record your temperature!
clockin_9: Are you sure you want to start?
clockin_20: Are you sure you want to end the clock-in process?
clockin_21: The additional clockins will be considered as valid and extemporaneous.
clockout_1: To enter the workers to the day, you must start the clock-out process.
clockout_4: You have already clock out in the day, click on the following button to see the details of the process.
clockout_5: You must perform your clockin in order to start the clock out process.
clockout_7: The EXTEMPORARY Clock Out is ONLY for workers who leave BEFORE the end of the day, or who did not Clock-Out at the end of the day.
clockout_8: There is a clock-out process in progress, you must register.
clockout_9: There is a clock-out process in progress, but you must first clock in before you can clock out, or just go to the process.
clockout_10: Are you sure you wish to continue?
clockout_23: Are you sure you want to end the clock-out process?
clockout_24: The additional clockout will be considered as valid and extemporaneous.
wr_2: To register the day's report you must complete the following form.
wr_6: What do you want to do next?
wr_12: Select active drivers on the day
wr_15: Was there a trip to the job site?
wr_24: The sending of the report is still running.
wr_25: There are still workers to check on the day!
wr_26: The Report has been sent successfully!
wr_27: Who do you want to send the report to?
wr_28: Are you sure you want to send the report to all workers?
wr_31: Are you sure you want to send the report to the client?
wr_38: The day has been successfully completed!
new_not: You have a new notification to read
infor_re: Do you want to submit the report for review?
to_crew: To the start a crew sheet, you need to select a shift firstt
to_crew1: To the start a crew sheet you must click on Accept
to_crew2: There is a Crew Sheet already in process. You need to finalice this first in order to create a new ones
account_valid: Your account has been successfully validated
confirm_2: By clicking on the link we sent you to:
confirm_3: Please remember to also check your spam folder
login1: We are ready for you, please come in.
register_user2: By clicking 'Create account', you agree to our 'Terms & Conditions' and 'Privacy Policy'
recoverp1: You will receive a validation code in your email.
code2: Enter the code you received in your email.
inactive_: You are trying to deactivate your account
inactive_confirm: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account?
delete_: You are trying to delete your account
delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
text_job: See your job offers received and applied at any time.
inactive_a: The account is inactive, if you have not activated it, activate it, otherwise contact the Employ Staff at the following email: accounts@emplooy.com
info_d: You are about to delete your account. This action is final and can't be reversed.
info_d1: If you are currently under contract with an employer within Emplooy, you must first end that contract before deleting your account.
info_d2: You won't have access to Emplooy's features anymore under this account.
confirm_d1: We need to confirm your credentials to proceed to delete your account.
delete1: Emplooy will keep your clock in, clock out and workday reports for up to a maximum of 1 year.
delete2: You won't have access to your profile, clock ins, clock outs, employer data or any other information that requires an account to log in into Emplooy app.
delete3: Any information you may require during this 1 year period must be requested via email to support@emplooy.com. Take note of your Emplooy ID as this will be the only way to identify you after your account is deleted.
